If you are a dad who would like to join of men committed to being the best father they can be, tune in to the Front Row Dads podcast.
attributes.title: Better dads make better businessmen

attributes.review: Every time I hear this podcast, I feel more grounded.  When I feel like I've been sucked up into the tornado of life, this podcast brings me back to ground, reminds me of my purpose, and brings me back into focus.  It is the most powerful podcast in my life. Thank you!
attributes.title: This podcast grounds me

attributes.review:
great listen. John and his message is always so beautifully clear and precise. 
listened to this on the backend of a 3 day fever, which coincidentally, came after my first 2 days in the gym i’m 10 years! 
i hope to get back at it tomorrow.
i hope hundreds can hear this.
attributes.title: L4 Fitness

attributes.review: I recently started a new morning routine of swimming laps, and already started listening to Front Row Dads podcasts while swimming. I can honestly say listening to Jon's interviews and perspectives has been life changing.  Not only have I learned valuable lessons, Jon helps identify specific tools that we can use as Dads to be better husbands, fathers and friends. Said simply, transforming from business men with families, to family men with businesses.  Thank you Jon!!!  Keep the podcasts coming!
attributes.title: Highly Recommend!!  Life changing Podcasts!

attributes.review: I have been catching up by listening to every past podcast in order. The Jim Sheils episode is by far my favorite!! I’ve always done 1:1 with my kids but never thought to schedule it to increase anticipation. This podcast has not only changed my life but my entire families as well. You owe it to your family to subscribe, listen, and listen again!! Even the best dads can learn to be better thanks to Jon Vroman!
attributes.title: Life Changing Podcast!!!

attributes.review:
This podcast provides the support, encouragement, and community I have needed to bring out my best as a husband and father.  

Great guests that are relatable and full of wisdom.  Jon is positive, insightful, and inspirational.  

This will get you pumped to be a awesome family leader.  Oh... and your wife will love you for it!
attributes.title: I can’t express how wonderful this podcast is!

attributes.review: I love listening to this podcast during my first-in-the-morning run. So many great guests, discussions, laugh-out-loud moments, self-identifying moments, oh-me-too-moments, and learning opportunities. A must-listen for those wanting to be more of a Dad and not just-a-father.
attributes.title: Great start to the day

attributes.review:
I just listened to my first episode of Front Row Dads. What a treat! Jon does an AMAZING job of delivering cutting-edge content in a grounded, honest way. 

Do yourself a favor and listen in - especially if you want to be a better parent, and a better person, raising well-rounded, self-aware children.
attributes.title: IMPORTANT listen for parents who want to make a real difference

attributes.review: Great podcast with a diverse list of high quality guests on all topics relating to fatherhood and marriage. Jon is a genuine person which makes for great interviews. If you’re looking for growth in your personal life related to your marriage and parenting, this is the podcast for you.
attributes.title: A must for any Dad  or Husband looking to grow

attributes.review: The messages are diverse and very insightful for Dads of all ages.  Check it out.
attributes.title: Love it

attributes.review: The content, guests, and interview style leave you walking away with valuable information and insights on how to become an awesome father and terrific spouse.
attributes.title: Inspiring, Insightful, Unique

attributes.review: Listening to this podcast with Jon has helped me set myself on a path to being a better father than I ever thought I could be. My first child will be here before June 11th and I feel way more prepared because of this podcast. The talk with Ted was especially helpful as I’ve noticed my wife and I not being as close though this pregnancy and now I have strategies to fix that.
attributes.title: Life changing

attributes.review: The Front Row Dads podcast is purely empowering as a fellow father and entreprenuer! Jon Vroman’s welcoming personality shines through his engaging questions for the guests, creating content rich knowledge that has inspired me to be a better dad, husband and person. I look forward to listening to his new interviews with motivational and influential guests. Thank you Jon for your focus on building a community to empower dads to be better.
attributes.title: Empowering!

attributes.review: Every podcast I have listened to (over a dozen) I have come away with multiple takeaways that will help me become a better dad and family man.  This podcast has really motivated me to connect with other dads and talk about our families more.  Jon makes each interview fun and really engages with each guest in a different way to bring out their strengths.  So thankful for this podcast and excited to join the next dads retreat!
attributes.title: Extremely helpful

attributes.review: A must for dads & husbands!!!!
attributes.title: OUTSTANDING!!!!

attributes.review: It’s far to easy everyday to feel too busy or preoccupied or overwhelmed with so many little things or non value efforts that distract from what’s important.  John and his guest are a reminder of that very time I get to listen to his casts.
attributes.title: A subtle reminder....

attributes.review: Jon Vroman rocks and the Front Row Dad’s messaging is always solid.
attributes.title: Huge Props

attributes.review: I'm a busy entrepreneur commited to be a great husband and father.  Jon delivers practical insight consistently that helps me do this.  It takes daily commitment and Jon and his guests are helping big time.
attributes.title: What I NEED!

attributes.review: I got the opportunity to first meet Jon at his 1st Dad’s Retreat in Philly and love the fact that he’s the same genuine person you hear on the podcast in real life. Jon has a true passion for destilling the best practices of others so you can make a bigger impact as a parent and this podcast does just that, must listen and subscribe!
attributes.title: Next Best Thing to Live Dads Retreat

attributes.review: Jon is able to get his guests to share the highs and lows, to create a fatherhood how to manual one little piece at a time.  Every guest is unique, and willing to share anything they can to better the fellow man
attributes.title: One of a kind content

attributes.review: They say it takes a community to raise a child so what better community could you find that is focused on men being “real men” that take their role as a father seriously. It is great to know I’m not alone with the bonehead mistakes we all make as parents and husbands. Bonus is I learn something every episode that helps me step up my game a little further. Life long learning.
attributes.title: It takes a community

attributes.review: Besides for conversations, I truly respect the actions put in practice by Jon and his family. He is an easy leader to follow.
attributes.title: Leads by example

attributes.review: Hands down this is my “don’t miss it” podcast for any Dad who is/wants to be a high performer for his family just as much as at work. Perfect length and every interview is full of great insights tying together fatherhood with marriage/ relationships, career and contribution.  Study here and earn that #1 Dad mug you got.
attributes.title: Favorite podcast

attributes.review: Outstanding content - LOVE IT🔥
attributes.title: Well Done!

attributes.review: If you want insights on how to be up your game as a dad tune in to this podcast and learn strategies that you can implement today.
attributes.title: Simple.  Effective.  Insightful.

attributes.review: As a father of two, this podcast is a game-changer for our family.
attributes.title: A must-listen podcast for every Dad!!

attributes.review: I love and appreciate all of the value that Jon consistently brings to my life and now my family's life. I can't say enough great things about this podcast and the content
attributes.title: Pure Value

attributes.review: Jon is a great interviewer who is able to deftly handle difficult topics.  Parenting is one of the great challenges in life, and this podcast is full of ideas on how to be more effective.  Great work!
attributes.title: Unique and great podcast
